2. Asmir Begović made his debut for Chelsea during a pre-season tour, coming on at half time for Thibaut Courtois in a match against the New York Red Bulls.

4. Begović earned his first clean sheet of the season for Chelsea in a UEFA Champions League match against Maccabi Tel Aviv, resulting in a 4-0 win for Chelsea.
5. Begović kept a sequence of three clean sheets for Chelsea before Courtois returned to the team on December 5th.
